title: Hour 1: Zi-On The Bench
description:
In this episode, Stephen A. Smith debates Chris "Mad Dog" Russo on what they should expect from Aaron Rodgers and the Packers when they play the 5-1 Bills this weekend. Kimberly A. Martin joins the show to preview the Ravens Buccaneers TNF matchup and gives her take on which team needs this win more. Domonique Foxworth is here to debate if the Dolphins are dangerous again with Tua back at QB. Tim Legler joins the crew to give his insight on whether or not Zion Williamson's injury is cause for concern.

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Is Zion Williamson's injury something or nothing?
